i_hard_composition_tips.text_template: Hardscape tip: use odd numbers and a strong focal point (rule of thirds). Keep the front open for depth.

i_hard_rinse_stones.text_template: Rinse your stones to remove loose dust before placing them.

i_hard_soak_driftwood.text_template: Soak your driftwood, glue it to rocks, or weigh it down. Dry wood floats!

i_sub_no_rinse_aquasoil.text_template: Handle your Aquasoil gently. Do NOT rinse it. Rinsing active soil breaks down the nutrient pellets and turns your tank into a mud bath.

t_hard_finalize_layout.text_template: Finalize your hardscape layout. Make sure it is stable and won't shift during planting.

t_sub_place_slope.text_template: Pour and slope the substrate (higher in the back, lower in the front) to create depth.

t_sub_rinse_inert.text_template: Rinse your sand/gravel in a bucket until the water runs clear. This prevents permanent cloudiness.
